writer.name: 奥古斯特·斯特林堡 August Strindberg

introduction: A puzzle suspense arthouse drama film with a story told backwards, which portrays the consequences of the evil behavior of a woman in her early sixties who, in her rampant obsession to feel young and attractive, want to get what she likes no matter how. She triggers the total destruction of her husband and young adult children, with whom she has formed a totally dysfunctional family. An intense story that dives deep into the past of the dreaful events where resides the roots of the family tragedy.
